highlighted_projects.description: Created interactive web app that serves as an encyclopedia for the 5th generation of Pok√©mon to develop HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other web development skills. Used React and Bootstrap frameworks for frontend to develop the user interface.
highlighted_projects.name: Unova Pokedex

description: Developed a series of bash scripts designed to capture host hardware specification data and host hardware resource usage data and update and report said usage data on a minute by minute basis.
host_info.sh captures host hardware specification data and host_usage.sh captures resource usage data. psql_docker.sh is used to interact with and manage the required docker container
Used PostgreSQL for database management and to store collected information.
jarvis_projects.name: Cluster Monitor

name: Vikramjeet Gill

professional_experience.description: Built various software projects both for internal use and for clients. Applied the Agile framework implementation Scrum to coordinate with team members to produce software.
professional_experience.title: Software Developer

professional_experience.description: Utilized React and other front-end frameworks to develop user interfaces for client websites. Applied UI and UX design principles to design client websites.
professional_experience.title: Software Developer

summary: My name is Vikramjeet Gill. I am a recent graduate of York University and I have a bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I am a software developer here at Jarvis. Before working at Jarvis I worked for a nonprofit called Software For Love mostly doing front-end work designing websites for clients including charities. Before that, I was working as a student success mentor lead at York where I was responsible for managing our Peer Helper program and leading a team of over 30 people. What excites me most about the software development industry is the opportunity to work on a wide variety of projects in many industries. Businesses in every sector of the economy require software developers so as a developer you have the option of working for whatever sector you want ranging from banking to big tech to gaming to aerospace to E-commerce and more.
